lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Brunswick expects its recreation centers to benefit from increased attention to the sport of bowling resulting from acceptance in the 1988 Summer Olympics of bowling as an exhibition sport and as a medal sport in the 1991 Pan American Games, he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Shareholders at the company's April 27 annual shareholders meeting will be asked to approve an increase in the authorized common shares outstanding to 200 mln from 100 mln shares, a company spokesman said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said field testing of a new bowling concept involving electronic features is being readied for test marketing this summer, and if successful, could "materially benefit" operations.
